otherPrivacyLaws.lawName: Alabama Data Breach Notification Act of 2018
otherPrivacyLaws.description: The Alabama Data Breach Notification Act of 2018 is a legislative measure aimed at protecting the personal information of Alabama residents and establishing procedures for notifying individuals and appropriate authorities in the event of a data breach

The development, implementation, and maintenance of an information security program about the extent of its operations and the sensitivity of the non-public information under its ownership, custody, or control are requirements for covered entities licensed by the Alabama Department of Insurance.

The Alabama Right of Publicity Act aims to protect individuals' interests in controlling the commercial exploitation of their identity and provides legal recourse for unauthorized use by third parties.
